name: Psychological Warfare Defense
description: Mastering defensive strategies to neutralize high-level psychological attacks by PSNs.

cards.title: Detecting Psychological Attacks in Real Time
cards.description: Recognizing subtle and overt forms of psychological warfare before they take effect.
bulletpoints: Recognizing the signs of coercive persuasion tactics.
Developing instant response protocols to disrupt psychological attacks.
cards.summaryText: Read micro-manipulations as they happen, clock the exact persuasion play they’re running, and fire off your prebuilt counter before the attack lands.

cards.title: Emotional Resilience as a Shield
cards.description: Using emotional control to resist PSN manipulation strategies.
bulletpoints: Training in emotional neutrality to prevent reaction-based control.
Utilizing deep breathing and anchoring techniques to maintain composure.
Developing an internal reference point to prevent external narrative hijacking.
cards.summaryText: Flatten your emotional response so they get no leverage, use breath and anchors to stay steady, and keep your internal compass locked so outside narratives can’t hijack you.

cards.title: Reversing the Psychological Attack
cards.description: Turning the manipulator’s psychological tactics against them.
bulletpoints: Using Socratic questioning to dismantle deceptive narratives.
Deploying controlled misinterpretation to disrupt the attacker’s control.
Implementing logical traps that force manipulators into self-defeat.
cards.summaryText: Pull their story apart with relentless questions, misinterpret strategically to derail the script, and spring logic traps that make them undo themselves.
